forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. SSE winds shifting to W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
